channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwanese American College Student Invents App To Preserve Taiwanese Hokkien
item.description: Taiwanese Hokkien was the dominant language in Taiwan until Mandarin Chinese was brought over and enforced as the national language at the end of the Chinese Civil War in 1949. Tai

item.title: MasterÂ Works With Young and Old To Pass Down Hakka Lion Dance
item.description: One of the last Hakka Lion dance masters in Taiwan and his apprentices help pass down the tradition to keep it alive.

item.title: Analysis: Myanmar Junta Loses Key Town on Thai Border
item.description: Another dramatic loss for Myanmar's embattled ruling junta as rebel forces seize control of a key town on the border with Thailand. But what will this mean for the people of the co

item.title: Kaohsiung Hospital Fined for Operating on Wrong Patient
item.description: A Kaohsiung hospital has been fined and at least five medical personnel have been fired or received demerits after performing surgery on the wrong patient.
